name: IHS
description:
This is the IHS or the Internal Hacking System. Its purpose is to unlock contents that are kept private.

This is a game series with episodes getting posted.

Made for the Major Jam 4:Cosmic!

Controls:

(U+0001)1:Change Crate

(U+0002)2:Change Droppy

(U+0141, U+0144)A and D:Move

(U+0020)Space:Move

Credits:

Music by:Kyle Merckx
